00025 #include "OgreSubEntity.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreEntity.h"
00028 #include "OgreSceneManager.h"
00029 #include "OgreMaterialManager.h"
00030 #include "OgreSubMesh.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034     SubEntity::SubEntity ()
00035     {
00036         mpMaterial = 0;
00037     }
00038     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039     SubMesh* SubEntity::getSubMesh(void)
00040     {
00041         return mSubMesh;
00042     }
00043     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044     const String& SubEntity::getMaterialName(void) const
00045     {
00046         return mMaterialName;
00047     }
00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     void SubEntity::setMaterialName( const String& name)
00050     {
00051 
00052         //String oldName = mMaterialName;
00053         mMaterialName = name;
00054         // Update SceneManager re material change
00055         //mParentEntity->mCreatorSceneManager->_notifyMaterialUsage(oldName, mMaterialName, this);
00056         mpMaterial = (Material*)MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(mMaterialName);
00057         // Ensure new material loaded (will not load again if already loaded)
00058         mpMaterial->load();
00059 
00060 
00061     }
00062     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     Material* SubEntity::getMaterial(void) const
00064     {
00065         return mpMaterial;
00066     }
00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     void SubEntity::getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& rend)
00069     {
00070         mSubMesh->_getRenderOperation(rend);
00071     }
00072     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     void SubEntity::getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform)
00074     {
00075         if (!mParentEntity->mNumBoneMatrices)
00076         {
00077             // No bones, just a single world matrix
00078             *xform = mParentEntity->getParentNode()->_getFullTransform();
00079         }
00080         else
00081         {
00082             // Bones, use cached matrices built when Entity::_updateRenderQueue was called
00083             int i;
00084             for (i = 0; i < mParentEntity->mNumBoneMatrices; ++i)
00085             {
00086                 *xform = mParentEntity->mBoneMatrices[i];
00087                 ++xform;
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092 }
